title: Intern - Software Engineer
keywords: enterprise level software development life cycles
purpose: To support product integration and contribute to the development of Itron's outcomes business using innovative Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) technologies within Microsoft Azure.
duties_responsibilities: Design and execute code in C# to support product integration
Participate in product design reviews and provide input on integration of functional requirements, product designs, and forecasting
Analyze and decompose complex software systems and collaborate with others to improve the overall design
Develop and support the testing of product features throughout the development cycle
Collaborate and communicate frequently with data team and project stakeholders

required_qualifications.education: Enrolled in a related degree or training program (Computer Science or Computer Engineering preferred) with completion of at least two years of college courses
required_qualifications.experience: 0-2 years. Previous internship or co/op experience is preferred.
skills: Ability to effectively articulate technical challenges and solutions
Working knowledge of version control systems (ideally Git)
Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a group
Experience working in an Agile development environment
Knowledge of standard enterprise level software development life cycles
Work with relational databases like SQL Server or PostgreSQL

company_info.overview: Itron enables utilities and cities to safely, securely and reliably deliver critical infrastructure solutions. We provide smart networks, software, services, meters, and sensors to better manage electricity, gas, water, and city services.
company_info.mission: We are dedicated to creating a more resourceful world.
